bobblehead_photos_dimensions_positive.name: bobblehead_photos_dimensions_positive
bobblehead_photos_dimensions_positive.value: ("bobblehead_photos"."width" IS NULL OR "bobblehead_photos"."width" > 0) AND ("bobblehead_photos"."height" IS NULL OR "bobblehead_photos"."height" > 0)

bobbleheads_year_range.name: bobbleheads_year_range
bobbleheads_year_range.value: "bobbleheads"."year" IS NULL OR ("bobbleheads"."year" >= 1800 AND "bobbleheads"."year" <= EXTRACT(YEAR FROM NOW()) + 5)

featured_content_date_logic.name: featured_content_date_logic
featured_content_date_logic.value: "featured_content"."start_date" IS NULL OR "featured_content"."end_date" IS NULL OR "featured_content"."start_date" <= "featured_content"."end_date"

notifications_read_at_logic.name: notifications_read_at_logic
notifications_read_at_logic.value: ("notifications"."is_read" = false AND "notifications"."read_at" IS NULL) OR ("notifications"."is_read" = true AND "notifications"."read_at" IS NOT NULL)
